titleStmt.title: A manifeste detection of the notable falshed of that part of Iohn Frithes boke whiche he calleth his foundacion, and bosteth it to be inuincible: newly set foorthe by Iohn Gwinneth clerke.
titleStmt.author: Gwynneth, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: [In Fletestrete in the hous of Thomas Berthelet],

notesStmt.note: A reply to Frith, John. A boke made by John Frith prisoner in the tower of London (STC 11381).
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
